articles.title: 5 Covid Deaths, 2,073 New Cases In Delhi In 24 Hours
articles.description: The coronavirus positivity rate and daily Covid cases in Delhi have risen steadily in the last one week.
articles.content:
Delhi has 183 Coronavirus containment zones at present.

articles.title: Delhi's 4th Monkeypox Case Found In Foreign National, 9 Cases In India
articles.description: Another foreign national has contracted Monkeypox in Delhi -- the fourth case of the disease in the national capital. Altogether, nine cases of the  disease have surfaced in India -- all in Kerala and Delhi.
articles.content: New Delhi: Another foreign national has tested positive for Monkeypox in Delhi -- the fourth such case in the national capital. The patient is a 31-year-old woman. It is not yet known if she travelle… [+1610 chars]

articles.title: Babul Supriyo's jibe at BJP after taking oath as minister in Mamata cabinet
articles.description: After Babul Supriyo took oath as the West Bengal cabinet minister on Wednesday, he targeted the BJP for not picking any Bengali as a cabinet minister in eight years.
articles.content:

articles.title: Rahul Gandhi Intervenes, Talk Of Rift Within Top 2 Karnataka Leaders
articles.description: There have been fears that the party might implode ahead of the state elections if the rivalry between two leaders -- legislature party leader Siddaramaiah and state president DK Shivakumar -- over the chief minister's post is not resolved.
